entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 10:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 2.9°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Risk of thundershowers this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain this evening then to snow after midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 8 except minus 12 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8 except minus 12 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
